title: Enhancing Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Designing and Implementing Science Research Projects Using ChatGPT

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: The process of selecting scientific research topics and conducting literature reviews can be streamlined by over 30% using ChatGPT.
Learners can critically evaluate generative AI outputs and apply them to research design.
Learners can complete a ChatGPT-based scientific problem-solving process through PBL team projects.
Learners can identify ethical issues that may arise when using AI tools and propose mitigation strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
